summary: "The Terminator" is a 1984 sci-fi action movie directed by James Cameron. It stars Arnold Schwarzenegger as a robot assassin sent back in time to kill Sarah Connor (Linda Hamilton), whose future son will save humanity. Kyle Reese (Michael Biehn) is sent to protect her. Cameron dreamt up the story and developed it with William Wisher Jr. The film was a big hit, launching Cameron's career and making Schwarzenegger a top star. It led to many sequels, a TV show, and other media. In 2008, it was preserved in the U.S. National Film Registry.
title: The Terminator
